mapper.select: SELECT sm.site_name siteHostName,sm2.site_name siteGuestName,js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count,sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id=js.site_host_id and sm2.id=js.site_guest_id

SELECT (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS siteHostName, (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_guest_id) AS siteGuestName, (SELECT sm.institutions FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS institutions, js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_host_id in (select * from (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions !=#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status=2 order by institutions asc, site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize} ) tmp )

SELECT sm2.institutions,sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) group by sm2.institutions

select count(1) from ( select sm2.institutions host_institutions ,sm.institutions guest_institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and (sm.institutions =#{institutions} or sm2.institutions=#{institutions}) group by sm2.institutions ,sm.institutions )tmp

select count(1) from ( select sm2.institutions host_institutions ,sm.institutions guest_institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and (sm.institutions =#{institutions} or sm2.institutions=#{institutions}) group by sm2.institutions ,sm.institutions )tmp

SELECT (case when sm2.institutions = #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} then sm.institutions else sm2.institutions end) as institutions, sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date=#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and (sm.institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} or sm2.institutions=#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions}) group by sm2.institutions ,sm.institutions order by institutions limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize}

SELECT (case when sm2.institutions = #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} then sm.institutions else sm2.institutions end) as institutions, sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and (sm.institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} or sm2.institutions=#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions}) group by sm2.institutions ,sm.institutions order by institutions limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(job_success_count) successJobCount ,sum(job_running_count) runningJobCount, sum(job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM t_job_statistics where job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp1, ( SELECT COUNT(1) institutionsCount FROM ( ( select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE}) UNION (select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_host_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE}) ) tmp ) tmp2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(job_success_count) successJobCount ,sum(job_running_count) runningJobCount, sum(job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM t_job_statistics where job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp1, ( SELECT COUNT(1) institutionsCount FROM ( ( select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}) UNION (select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_host_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}) ) tmp ) tmp2

select count(1) from (select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions) tmp

(SELECT site_guest_institutions institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp) UNION ( SELECT site_host_institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp)

(SELECT site_guest_institutions institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp) UNION ( SELECT site_host_institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp)

SELECT institutions ,SUM(b.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(b.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(b.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(b.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount from ((SELECT site_guest_institutions institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodayQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp) UNION ( SELECT site_host_institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodayQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp) order by institutions limit #{startIndex}, #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodayQo.pageSize}) a, t_job_statistics b WHERE b.job_finish_date= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodayQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND ( a.institutions=b.site_guest_institutions OR a.institutions=b.site_host_institutions) GROUP BY a.institutions order by institutions

SELECT institutions ,SUM(b.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(b.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(b.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(b.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount from ((SELECT site_guest_institutions institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE}) tmp) UNION ( SELECT site_host_institutions FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) tmp) order by institutions limit #{startIndex}, #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.pageSize}) a, t_job_statistics b WHERE b.job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND ( a.institutions=b.site_guest_institutions OR a.institutions=b.site_host_institutions) GROUP BY a.institutions order by institutions

select institutions, sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{jobStatisticsSummaryTodayQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions order by sm.institutions asc limit #{startIndex}, #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodayQo.pageSize}

SELECT ( SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT a.site_guest_id FROM t_job_statistics a WHERE a.job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND a.site_guest_institutions = #{institutions} GROUP BY a.site_guest_id UNION SELECT b.site_host_id FROM t_job_statistics b WHERE b.job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND b.site_host_institutions = #{institutions} GROUP BY b.site_host_id ) tmp) siteCount , SUM(job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(job_success_count) successJobCount ,sum(job_running_count) runningJobCount, sum(job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and ( site_guest_institutions = #{institutions} OR site_host_institutions = #{institutions} )

SELECT ( SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT a.site_guest_id FROM t_job_statistics a WHERE a.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND a.site_guest_institutions = #{institutions} GROUP BY a.site_guest_id UNION SELECT b.site_host_id FROM t_job_statistics b WHERE b.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND b.site_host_institutions = #{institutions} GROUP BY b.site_host_id ) tmp) siteCount , SUM(job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(job_success_count) successJobCount ,sum(job_running_count) runningJobCount, sum(job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and ( site_guest_institutions = #{institutions} OR site_host_institutions = #{institutions} )

select count(1) FROM ( (SELECT site_guest_name site FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_guest_institutions= #{institutions} ) tmp ) UNION ( SELECT site_host_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_host_institutions= #{institutions} ) tmp ) )tmp1

SELECT a.site, (SELECT sm.party_id FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.site_name = a.site) AS partyId, sum(b.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(b.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(b.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(b.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM ( SELECT *FROM ( (SELECT site_guest_name site FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodaySiteAllQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_guest_institutions= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodaySiteAllQo.institutions} ) tmp ) UNION ( SELECT site_host_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodaySiteAllQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_host_institutions= #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodaySiteAllQo.institutions} ) tmp ) ) tmp1 ORDER BY site LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodaySiteAllQo.pageSize} ) a, t_job_statistics b WHERE b.job_finish_date = #{jobStatisticsSummaryTodaySiteAllQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} AND ( b.site_guest_name= a.site OR b.site_host_name= a.site) GROUP BY a.site

select count(1) FROM ( (SELECT site_guest_name site FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_guest_institutions= #{institutions} ) tmp ) UNION ( SELECT site_host_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_host_institutions= #{institutions} ) tmp ) )tmp1

SELECT a.site, (SELECT sm.party_id FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.site_name = a.site) AS partyId, sum(b.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(b.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(b.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(b.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM ( SELECT *FROM ( (SELECT site_guest_name site FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_guest_institutions= #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.institutions} ) tmp ) UNION ( SELECT site_host_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_job_statistics WHERE job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND site_host_institutions= #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.institutions} ) tmp ) ) tmp1 ORDER BY site LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.pageSize} ) a, t_job_statistics b WHERE b.job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummarySiteAllForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND ( b.site_guest_name= a.site OR b.site_host_name= a.site) GROUP BY a.site

SELECT sm.site_name siteHostName,sm2.site_name siteGuestName,count(js.job_success_count) job_success_count,count(js.job_failed_count) job_failed_count,count(js.job_running_count) job_running_count,count(js.job_waiting_count) job_waiting_count,sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id=js.site_host_id and sm2.id=js.site_guest_id group by sm.site_name,sm2.site_name,sm.institutions

SELECT sm2.institutions,sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id = sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) group by sm2.institutions

select count(1) from (select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions) tmp

select sm.institutions, sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date between #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions order by sm.institutions asc limit #{startIndex}, #{jobStatisticsSummaryForPeriodQo.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) from ( select js.site_host_id FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} group by js.site_host_id ) tmp

SELECT (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS siteHostName, (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_guest_id) AS siteGuestName, (SELECT sm.institutions FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS institutions, js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_host_id in ( select tmp.site_host_id from ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id ,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize} ) tmp )

select sm.institutions,sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm, ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize} ) tmp where sm.id=tmp.site_host_id

SELECT count(1) from ( select js.site_host_id FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by js.site_host_id ) tmp

SELECT (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS siteHostName, (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_guest_id) AS siteGuestName, (SELECT sm.institutions FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS institutions, js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_host_id in (select tmp.site_host_id from ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize} ) tmp )

select sm.institutions,sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm, ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id ,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize} ) tmp where sm.id=tmp.site_host_id
